XKCD plots: Deep learning evolution

As a follower of XKCD comics, I knew I needed to try the matplotlib XKCD style. I’ll use it to plot the evolution of the percentage of deep-learning papers in the major computer vision conferences (see my series of posts).


And here the plot:
